name: Cloudify Media - AI Saas tool
description: CloudifyMedia, an AI SaaS tool for media compression and content-aware cropping. It optimizes images for social media formats using AI, with Prisma ORM and Neon DB for database management.

name: Mystery Message
description: Mystery Mail, a full-stack anonymous messaging app using TypeScript, Next.js, and React. It features NextAuth for secure authentication, MongoDB for scalable storage, and Zod for schema validation.

name: Post Space
description: Post Space, a full-stack web app using React and Appwrite for backend services, authentication, and database management. Utilized Redux Toolkit for state management and integrated a real-time text editor for blogs.

name: Music School UI
description: Music School UI, a responsive frontend UI using Next.js and React, with a modern design. Leveraged Aceternity UI and Shadcn for an enhanced visual experience.

name: Pass Manager
description: Pass Manager, a responsive password manager web app using React and Tailwind CSS, with an intuitive UI for securely storing usernames and passwords.
